name: LuPR: Lunar Post Recruit
description:
A retro first-person shooter party game where 1-4 local players battle with or against each other and AI bots as soldiers in a time when humans inhabit far reaches of the solar system. Peace between the planetary factions has been shattered and nowhere is safe. Join the fight for control of the planets and battle for victory!

Defeat preconfigured challenges to unlock game content or configure custom games with your favorite game modes, maps, weapons and player setup. Every game you play is a unique experience thanks to the AI NPCs and the randomness of your friends!

No micro-transactions or DLC... just like the 90s!

** NOTE - for now, players with PlayStation controllers should use something like DS4Windows so their controller is seen as an Xbox controller.

Team Based Arena-Style Game Modes

Configure game duration by time and/or point limits. Optional kid-friendly paintball mode to eliminate gore. Choose from 5 different game maps (6 if you beat the Map Unlock challenge).


  • Combat: Shoot people that are NOT on your team for points
  • King of the Hill: Race to the hill and keep enemies out long enough to get a point
  • Capture the Phone: Get to the other team's base to capture the phone, then get back to your base for a point
  • Hold the Grenade: A game of “Tag You're It” - Destroy the player with the grenade and once you have it DON'T DIE for more points

Weapons

Customize or randomize your game’s weapon slots with any of 14 weapons (2 must be unlocked to use) including: grenades, rocket launchers, crossbows, black hole guns, syringes, mines, foam hands, candy canes, snipes, laser guns, rifles, pistols.

Player Customization

Configure the following for each local player and the AI


  • Heads: Choose from 18 head options (16 additionally unlockable balloon heads and an alien head)
  • Body: 3 different body types (unlockable alien)
  • Health: Give individual players additional health up to x50
  • Sensitivity: Adjust the camera vertical and horizontal sensitivity
  • Camera Inversion: Individually configure the up/down camera controls
  • AI Configuration: Additionally configure the number of AI playing with or against you (up to 8) and the difficulty for each
  • Team Configuration: Configure the number and make-up of the teams. Auto distribution options (solo teams, local vs. AI, split into 2 teams, split into 3 teams, 2 person teams, random) or completely customizable.

Unlockable Content

Play challenge games to unlock content


  • Dual Wielding: Gain the ability to hold a gun in both of your hands
  • Fast Run: When activated, everyone runs very very quickly
  • Balloon Heads: 16 additional balloon head options for local players or the AI. They’re funny but one hit to the head and it’s all over
  • Get Tiny Then Explode: When activated, you get smaller instead of losing health and you finally explode when you get too small
  • Slow Motion: When activated, everything is slow and bullets are very slow
  • One Hit Kills: When activated, anybody dies with one hit to any body part
  • Bouncy Grenades: An additional grenade weapon that bounces…Vigorously
  • Bouncing Bullets: When activated, all bullets gain a ricochet effect. Try not to hurt yourself!
  • Unstoppable Arrows: When activated arrows to the body and head are a one hit kill and they continue on their merry way after hitting people
  • Foam Hand Gun: An additional powerful weapon - A pretend gun that requires no ammo, just say pew pew
  • Lunatic AI: Unlock the top AI difficulty - Extra hard and extra head-shotty
  • Alien Body: An additional alien character option for local players or the AI
  • No Radar: When activated, your HUD has no magical radar. Just like real life. Good luck!
  • Extended Magazines: When activated, enjoy bonus ammo
  • Infinite Ammo: Enjoy bottomless magazines
  • Lunar Bay 42 Map: Unlock an additional game map

More content to be released during Early Access. Provide your feedback in the forum to help shape the game!
